text: Behind a Long Wall (Spanish: Detrás de un largo muro) is a 1958 Argentine drama movie directed by Lucas Demare and starring Susana Campos, Gloria Ferrandiz, Francisco Audenino, Alberto Barcel, Cayetano Biondo, Warly Ceriani, Inés Moreno, Mario Passano. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lucas Demare
title: Behind a Long Wall
